trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for entity templates.
Entity templates are user controls that apply to an entity (a table) instead of to a single data field, as with field templates.
trans-unit.target: Enheten maler er brukerkontroller som gjelder for en enhet (en tabell) i stedet for til et enkelt datafelt i likhet med Feltmaler.

trans-unit.source: An entity template typically contains several <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl> controls for rendering data fields.
trans-unit.target: En mal for enheten inneholder flere vanligvis <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl>Kontroller for gjengivelse datafelt.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the data-bound control that contains this entity template.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen databundet kontrollen som inneholder denne malen for enheten.

trans-unit.source: The ContainerType class provides information about the context (the control type) in which the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl> class is contained.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ContainerType gir informasjon om konteksten (kontrolltypen) der den <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl>klassen ligger.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl>

trans-unit.source: This type can be a list control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen kan være en listekontroll, for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: It can also be a single-item control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Det kan også være en kontroll med ett element, som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the behavior of an application depending on the ContainerType value, such as conditionally displaying or hiding specific UI elements.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse virkemåten for en applikasjon avhengig ContainerType-verdien, for eksempel betinget vise eller skjule bestemte UI-elementer.

trans-unit.source: The type that contains the template.
Gets the data-rendering mode for the entity.
The data-rendering mode for the entity.
Gets the table that the entity template applies to.
The table that the entity template applies to.
Gets the validation to apply to the entity control group.
trans-unit.target: Henter valideringen til bruker på enheten kontroll-gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The validation to apply to the entity control group.
